# qala
# package manager
# windows
https://scoop.sh/

Set-ExecutionPolicy -ExecutionPolicy RemoteSigned -Scope CurrentUser
Invoke-RestMethod -Uri https://get.scoop.sh | Invoke-Expression
 
$env:SCOOP = "D:\Users\domni\scoop"

[environment]::setEnvironmentVariable('SCOOP', 'D:\Users\domni\scoop', 'User')
[environment]::setEnvironmentVariable('SCOOP_GLOBAL', 'D:\GlobalScoopApps', 'Machine')
iex (new-object net.webclient).downloadstring('https://get.scoop.sh')

net start vmpcompute

scoop bucket add java
scoop bucket add jetbrains https://github.com/JetBrains/scoop-utils
scoop bucket add extras
scoop bucket add versions
scoop bucket add main
scoop install git
scoop install git-lfs
scoop install erlang
scoop install elixir
scoop install python
scoop install versions/python27
scoop install ruby

# Remove-Item -Path "D:\Users\domni\scoop" -Reccurse

scoop install opam
opam init -y

C:\Users\domni\AppData\Local\opam\.cygwin\setup-x86_64.exe


pacman -Syu
pacman -S git make
pacman -S mingw-w64-x86_64-gcc

curl -O https://erlang.mk/erlang.mk


make -f erlang.mk bootstrap
make

/d/Users/domni/scoop/apps/erlang/28.1.1/bin/erl
export PATH=$PATH:/d/Users/domni/scoop/apps/erlang/28.1.1/bin/

reg import 'C:\Users\domni\scoop\apps\git\current\install-file-associations.reg'
reg import "C:\Users\domni\scoop\apps\notepadplusplus\current\install-context.reg"


curl -o eigen.zip  https://gitlab.com/libeigen/eigen/-/archive/3.4.0/eigen-3.4.0.zip
7z x eigen.zip


# notes
## postgresql
Run run 'pg_ctl start' or 'pg_ctl stop' to start and stop the database or
register it as a service by running 'pg_ctl register -N PostgreSQL' from an elevated shell.
Default superuser login: postgres, password: <blank>


scoop install rustup
rustup toolchain install stable-x86_64-pc-windows-gnu
rustup default stable-x86_64-pc-windows-gnu
